Reviews.Content: Battery does not last long. Other then that the device is great. Including for interesting the youngsters. It's good for distractions.

Reviews.Title: BROKE WITHIN FIRST WEEK
Reviews.Author: Teresa Spicer "RED41"
Reviews.Content: DROPPED ON FLOOR, SCREEN CRACKED WONT COME ON NOW. SCREEN NOT COVERED UNDER WARRANTY. IS NOT KID FRIENDLY. HAD PROTECTIVE CASE ON IT.

Reviews.Title: kurio tablets for kids
Reviews.Author: Helen Darlene Guzman
Reviews.Content: the tablets were better than i expected. i enjoy the parental control over what my children are allowed to watch.

Reviews.Title: the kurio tablet did not work
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I had to send it back because it did not work. and I have not heard anything else about it. and the payment have not been put back in my account. whats going on

Reviews.Title: worst gift
Reviews.Author: Danyca Simon
Reviews.Content: This was one of the worst gift I ever brought my son. He played with this product all of one week.I had trouble with downloading apps.I  tried reaching out customer service that is when I found out they only respond by email .the first time to respond back to me and 9 hours the second time to respond back to me in two week. I just wanted to comment on this product because I feel as though I want to go purchased this product there are better ones on the market we do not on products this was the worst so I feel it was a need to say something if I could I would return it but I couldn't find very very with this product it continues to stay on the dresser collecting dust in this point of having it for 2 months

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: Faith Wineberg
Reviews.Content: We returned it. It would not hold a charge. It was not worth the effort. Bought a kindle in it's place.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY IT
Reviews.Author: monica
Reviews.Content: I am NOT happy with this tablet. I dont even know where to begin. its probably ok for smaller children who will only be playing a few games. but if you want more out of it, or full use, FORGET IT!First of all, I will say that speed wise it is fine and also the battery life is not too bad considering the price. But, i hate the fact that it does not use google play store, so you can forget about finding any games you've ever gotten there. it only comes with the "kurio store" on which EVERYTHING costs $ there are NO free apps. then  they offer you to add other app stores ( not google play) but they offer them at your own risk, if anything goes wrong with your tablet from using the 3rd party stores, they will not be responsible. well, thats just crap. the other stores they offer, two of which i have never even heard of, one of them though, is amazon app. they do have free apps, but still not every available app you can get on google play. you cannot get the real Youtube app, no matter which of the 4 stores you choose. only one had the netflix app, and when i got it logged in and picked a movie, only the audio was working and not the video, so i tried another movie to make sure it wasnt just that movie, but no, still no video. contacted kurio. they will NOT help you, because netflix is a 3rd party app. so they had me called netflix. i called netflix and they were glad to try and help so they sent me an email with complicated instructions that i still havent figured out, i am SERIOUSLY considering returning the damn things ( i bought two) but i dont know what kids tablet i can get that uses google play, because im told nabi2 and kindle fire also use amazon app store. im SO disapointed because my kids and myself were looking forward to these tablets being great, and its the biggest let down ever. also, my kids' favorite game is Hayday, and it is NOT available in any of the 4 stores. what a disaster.I WOULD NOT RECCOMEND TO ANYONE TO BUY THIS TABLET!!!!!!!!!!!!and if you do, i hope you have no problems with it because kurios customer service really STINKS!Bad job Kurio, bad job :(UPDATE:After owning the tablet for about 2 weeks, a system update became available, and upon installing it, Google Play store is now available, which I am glad about. Also, after the update, Netflix began to work. Im glad Kurio did resolve these issues, as they were my main two concerns. Im still not happy with the fact I had to go through the hassle to begin with, and the fact they initially misrepresented the fact you could get netflix.However, now that the two main issues have been resolved, I would rate it 3 stars instead of one, for future buyers, assuming that when they get theirs, it will have the current update, and they wont have to go through the hassle that I did.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Melissa R. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is not worth the extra money.  I debated between this model and a Kindle Fire.  Because of the parental controls and kid friendly marketing the Kurio was our choice for our 6 y/r.  Compared to the Kindle Fire, the battery does not last as long, it takes longer to charge, the camera quality is very poor.  Adding apps from the Amazon store was not as easy as on a Kindle. We have 3 Kindle Fires in our house and will be adding another very soon.  I have returned it through the awesome help of Amazon Customer Service and will buy him a Kindle Fire HDX.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Elsie
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my Grandson for Christmas in October.  It worked for a week and then when you power it up it just keeps searching and does nothing.  I contacted the seller in January and they will do nothing about it.  I tried to contact Kurio the company and they do not answer e-mails or calls.  DO NOT BUY this I could have gotten it at Walmart for less.  I am calling the BBB

Reviews.Title: New name Turtle to the Snail
Reviews.Author: Ava
Reviews.Content: This is the slowest piece of junk I ever came across.  What child have the type of patient to wait at least 5 mins to turn on their tablet.  I brought this for my son 3rd birthday and it was broken in less than a month.  The apps are hard to download and it slow.  The computer allow barely any outside game at a fast rate.  The one that comes with the tablet are stupid and ridiculous, they can't keep a three year old attention.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY BUYING THIS PRODUCT.

Reviews.Title: 4 months and product stopped working.
Reviews.Author: leesette de santiago
Reviews.Content: My tablet stopped charging and no matter what plug I have tried to use it will not charge.  It will not turn on.  It does not work.  Poor product.  Waste of my money.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Betty Berthold
Reviews.Content: My Granddaughter loved it, they play it all the time, no complaints - It was a little hard to program

Reviews.Title: Sooo disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Max09
Reviews.Content: My son's grandmother bought him a Kurio for Christmas.  It worked on Christmas day and we charged it that night only to discover that it would no longer power up properly.  It was stuck in a "sleep mode" every time it powered up.  I emailed Kurio twice without ever hearing back from them and of course, they have no phone number listed.  I tried to start 2 live chat sessions and no one ever joined and then I finally reached someone on live chat and was told to perform two different methods for a factory reset - neither of them worked.  I would never recommend this product to anyone, not only because the Kurio itself is a poorly made product but because it is difficult to reach anyone at their company and they do not respond to tech support emails.  What a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Two of four ordered Kurio tablets would not charge! Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: Donna Luketich
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of the Kurio 7 tablets for my grandchildren for Christmas presents. Prior to Christmas I charged all 4 so they would be ready to use on the big night but one of my grandson's tablets was dead and would not charge at all. The only way he could play on his was sitting by an outlet with it plugged into an outlet. Next in Jan my granddaughter's is doing the same not charging and also unable to download aps to it.  Again very disappointing. I went on Amazon and returned both (two separate time) and the process to return was very good and credit issued back promptly.  I am concerned now in the very near future the other two will have the same issues?

Reviews.Title: Don't buy!
Reviews.Author: Bri
Reviews.Content: We purchased this tablet for my 4 year old for Christmas. Within three hours, the power button had broken off!! We proceeded to power it up with a pen for a few weeks and pushing it into the side. Then the volume button fell off!!! What a joke. I then found the receipt and returned it. Piece of junk!!

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my son. Within 2 weeks of purchase it locked up and we had to do a factory reset. We have done 2 more since. Now the battery wont charge and the company says to reset it again... that would be great if I could turn it on... but with no battery life left I cant do that. I want to return it and I will never purchase Kurio products again. I wish I had checked more reviews before I made this purchase. Just to return it is going to be a task... and my son is heart broken since this was his "big" gift...*Scratch sending it back to where I purchased it from. I bought it November 20th... they wont take a return. So if I want my Kurio touch replaced I have to deal with the company. So basically I have a very expensive paper weight. Greaaaaaaat.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING PRODUCT BUT WISH THERE WAS MORE IN STORAGE MEMORY
Reviews.Author: Tina
Reviews.Content: I love all the parental items it has and that you have full control over everything your child does on it.  I also love that it doesn't allow the kids to purchase anything by "accident" on the apps that have 1 touch purchasing.  The only complaint is that it doesn't store many of the newer apps bc they require a bit more memory.  Otherwise, it is amazing and durable, so much so that after we bought the first one for my 9 yr old daughter, we recently purchased another one for my 3 year old son.  :)

Reviews.Title: really liked the kurio
Reviews.Author: trish
Reviews.Content: My grandaughter received the Kurio for Christmas from a family friend They were going to buy her a Meep, but thankfully they changed their minds! The Kurio comes with full versions of ALL of the games my daughter loves to play on my iPad (cut the rope, angry birds, where's my water etc.). There are also plenty of educational games and it has several ebooks that she can either listen to, sound them out herself, or have someone read to her. Best of all there are parental controls!

Reviews.Title: my daughter only use 3 months
Reviews.Author: nelson
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift from my daughter,the first month it worked fine, the second month, he began to have problems in the percent load, in the third month only works connected to electricity,i spend my money on something cheap in the end not worth it, I regret having bought this article, My daughter loved this tablet, but now the tablet does not work and I will not buy another, I will not recommend this brand to anyone, sorry the quality is very poor, buy it on November 17 and Jan. 24 today no longer works, I would like to give me my money but they waste my time and finally I just offered another tablet. :( Now I have to buy a ipad of $399.

Reviews.Title: Waste of my money
Reviews.Author: Tracey M. Torreyson
Reviews.Content: Both my sons have one of these tablets and I absolutely don't like them! The battery on these things can be 90% or more and the thing turns off on them while they are playing a game or reading (and it does it QUITE often) and won't turn back on unless you plug the thing in. And when it is working, it runs slow. For $150.00 a pop, I think these tablets could have been better quality. For their birthdays this year I will be replacing them with the Kindle Fire. Good thing I hadn't bought one for my daughter yet!

Reviews.Title: Kurio Kids
Reviews.Author: Trish Arnold
Reviews.Content: This was for my grandson.  He would rather use my husband's ipad.  I don't know why but I liked his but I rate it as I see them.

Reviews.Title: great for the kids
Reviews.Author: sonya Allstun
Reviews.Content: this tablet is great for the kids. They love eit but for an adult I would say find another you wont be real happy with it. But it is durable and easy to use for kids  most apps the kids like to play load fine and just found out on their facebook page you can get google play store

Reviews.Title: For younger kids!
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Olsen
Reviews.Content: I think my kids, ages 7 & 9, are too old for the options offered. They only want items that we download and the wireless constantly shuts off...even when it shows a strong signal! It takes forever to download if it even allows us to do it!

Reviews.Title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: Lindiwe Mndebele
Reviews.Content: I am very disappointed with this gadget. I bought it for my nephew for his birthday and hardly 3 weeks later it just shut down and we cannot even charge it. For some reason Amazon omitted to include the receipt in the box so I figured it was impossible to return it. So I took it to the repairman and to my utter dismay he told me that it will cost more than the purchase price to repair it.I would be grateful if Amazon can advise what I should do now. I spent a lot of money on the tablet for it to be just thrown away without any compensation.

Reviews.Title: Nice tab for kids
Reviews.Author: Wiliam Myers
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little tablet for children --- only problem with this one is that it will not charge --- it charged at first and worked reallly well - LOVE the parental control in that of like a 'timer' so they (the kids) are not on it for too long at a time --- but after couple days it wound not re-charge when connected - will have to return it and request an exchange - but want another one just like this one -- and hope the re-charge part of it will work fine.

Reviews.Title: Waste of $200
Reviews.Author: Patrick D. Craft "Patrick Craft"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 7 year old who loves games and electronics. Comes with its own Kurio app store which is worthless and also has a few others you can install, amazon app being the only one worth using. One of the app stores had a porn app on it. This is suppose to be a family friendly tablet. The Kurio runs on a Android platform but is not approved by Google to run Google Play app store. Save your money and buy a tablet manufactured by a reputable company.

Reviews.Title: works only for a while
Reviews.Author: buttercup
Reviews.Content: this product has performance issuses.......worked for a while then you get a triangle in the center with an exclamation mark

Reviews.Title: Kurio 7
Reviews.Author: marisa morales
Reviews.Content: It never worked properly I'm actually returning it! Maybe if it worked it would've been a great Christmas present! Frustrating

Reviews.Title: Not pleased with product
Reviews.Author: Toyoa Wallace
Reviews.Content: Not pleased with product... I purchased 2 units, one didn't work straight from the box. I have emailed customer service through Kurio 3 times, no one has responded. Meanwhile I have a 4 year old that would like to use his tablet. The unit continues to shut off and has to be rebooted 10-12 times in a short time span. I am highly displeased. Also shopping was every expensive and it took longer than expected to receive. Would not recommend

Reviews.Title: Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0 - 7-Inch 4 GB
Reviews.Author: Jan Pierce
Reviews.Content: This is too cool.  Love the parental controls and the fact that it has tons of games.  Made a 10 year old's birthday.

Reviews.Title: Give Me Phone Back!
Reviews.Author: Lex
Reviews.Content: When I first ordered the Kurio for my two boys, I didn't know what to expect. Both boys on Christmas loved their gifts and were more than excited to use them. After figuring out the parental controls and downloading some apps from the Amazon store, my boys won't put the Kurio down. Because they had to share the I-pad with their dad, now they keep calling their Kurios "my I-pad." Because of some of the features, they really can't tell the difference between the two! I like the parental controls, ability to download from the Amazon app store, touch screen features, pin ability, and avatar selection for each child. The only thing I would improve is the screen resolution. Other than that. I'm really proud of myself for purchasing a quality product for a low price.

Reviews.Title: Really Disappointed
Reviews.Author: ethaniel war
Reviews.Content: I never commented but really disappointed me, buy this device Christmas gift for my 5 year old son and was excited about what it offered this tablet for my son but sadly the reality was different, the tablet promised 4 GB of storage and really only whatever with a measly 500 MB of internal storage and a 2GB internal SD, all other functions that served well but if you have no capacity for its limited storage facility. and never mind as I return would represent an expense which can not take it.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: My 8 year grandson just loved this. Now he fits eight in with the rest of the kids laying on their phones and tablets

Reviews.Title: Did not connect
Reviews.Author: Letisa Cole
Reviews.Content: This product never connected to wi-fi. No matter where we took it, we could not get it to work. We tried to contact customer service and all we got was an email, that told us to follow the same exact steps on the set up instructions. After researching the product reviews, there are more people out there having the same connection problem. This product  and their customer service, did not live up to expectations. This was suppose to be a Xmas gift for my niece and needless to say, we had to return it(after we had to pay for shipping).  I was not happy.

Reviews.Title: Pricey
Reviews.Author: Audrey Cooper
Reviews.Content: This item is Ok, but a little to pricey when Walmart have the whole bundle for $105.00. To many grand kids to pay that price.

Reviews.Title: Great product but no google app store or google play
Reviews.Author: Mr. G. B. D'alessio "zenkick"
Reviews.Content: I would have given this product 5 stars if it weren't for the fact you can not get google play or app store on this device, and it is not clearly stated anywhere in description. However it works exactly like a tablet, functions very smoothly and quickly between apps. Very useful setup feature allowing to control what a young child might erroneously stumble across on the net. I downloaded Amazon app store, kurio app store just doesn't have enough games of a decent quality, my son is 8, and he found them too simple!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: raynesha brown
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet to say it is used. We received it in a timely fashion and it came with everything in the box. The only down fall is I had to go on the Kurio website to find out how to reset the tablet b/c it had the previous owners information still on it and it doesn't connect to the internet. I would like to download more games for my children but for now it is a great. They are still learning the games that are pre-downloaded on it.All and all it is was a great purchase. The dealer was super nice when I called about concerns. They assured me that if it was anything wrong with it I could return it within 30 days.Great dealer and great purchase!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: great package, poor performance
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: We bought a Klu tablet and returned it because it would not power on.  We bought this one thinking it would be awesome and it is ok.  My kids play on my Kindle Fire now so it is NOT comparable in that there are not many free apps or children's books, or educational apps either.  We got it on Monday, yesterday it died pretty quickly.  After charging overnight, it died after an hour and half.I also had to remove the touch password because the first dot would not accept the touch.  The screens freeze and are not responsive.I love the design of the outside and the bumper but cute does not get the job done.  This is going back for another Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kurio is for Kids....
Reviews.Author: Samantha Evans
Reviews.Content: I have read some of the reviews and I think some of the negative ones are a bit unfair.  We bought one last Christmas 2012 for our 2 year old.  She's into my kindle and iphone so we bought one just for her.  The games that come standard are a bit lame.  We've downloaded her cute puppy games and she loves it.  Its worth the money, I think.  The parental screen is good too.  This is good for little ones only though.  As an adult you need a kindle or ipad.

Reviews.Title: First One Died, Second One BURNT
Reviews.Author: Ron M
Reviews.Content: STAY AWAY FROM THIS PRODUCT!!  Santa is ashamed to have given our kids a Kurio twice.  The first one we had, the unit stopped charging after 2 months of use.  We finally discovered the connector on the charger was not making contact with the socket.  The adaptor connector is extremely tiny and doesn't fit snugly in the socket.Santa made a special stop in March to replace our unit.  The second one has intermittently lost all power and settings several times without explanation.  We found that by letting the battery drain all the way down (simply by leaving it alone a few days), it would recharge but require a complete re-setup.  The entire hard drive was lost each time, including some great photos taken by our kids, which we hadn't had a chance to back up yet (who would think to do this every single day out of fear?).The most recent event after having the 2nd unit about 6 months, was that it decided to overheat while charging.  It was a good thing we were home to smell the burnt electronics.  The power adaptor was extremely hot, and the underside of the case melted and deformed.Two strikes are you're out.  We will NEVER, EVER again look at the Kurio brand.  We'll have to make up yet another excuse for Santa this Xmas.  It's pretty sad when the kids don't trust something from the North Pole.

Reviews.Title: wifi
Reviews.Author: Penny
Reviews.Content: So when you go to download an app to this tablet it cut the wifi off of it so nothing will be downloaded..It was a waste of my money should have went with the nabi 2 My friend has one for her kids and no troubles what so ever. I wont even resale this tablet to anyone i'm gonna put in trash and go buy a Nabi 2......DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET NO GOOD WASTE OF YOUR MONEY GO GET A NABI IT IS MORE MONEY BUT HEY IT WORKS :)

Reviews.Title: its ok!
Reviews.Author: chassitymurdock
Reviews.Content: I. Bought this tablet for my daughter for her birthday and its ok but she still prefers my ipad...I have trouble downloading YouTube and other things.but the camera is pretty good. Sometimes its a little confusing to me and her were it has the parental side or the kids version..so my daughter gets in settings and other stuff because she don't recognize the screen...were it has to way different looks...but overall its a pretty good tablet but don't think it's really worth 130.00 plus the battery don't stay charged long at all..but hope I was helpful...:)

Reviews.Title: WORKS FAST. THEN DOESNT WORK AT ALL.
Reviews.Author: Alex Rogers "CEO EXTREMEFITCAMP"
Reviews.Content: This KURIO 7S was purchased to replace my daughters Leap pad as she outgrew it. But the leap pad chord lasted longer than 1 month as this did. I would have loved to give this five stars but I found out this is a common design flaw as the pin/USB adapter is quite fragile. Nice $120.00 Paperweight

Reviews.Title: My 2 cents: Don't do it!
Reviews.Author: Rocco III
Reviews.Content: We got this for our daughter.  My whole family, having already used Apple devices, was really disappointed.  If you've already got Apple devices this thing will irritate the crap out of you with it's weak user interface and quirky apps that require accounts be established on multiple websites.  Sorry, but I say "F" this device.  I'm going to return this "toy" tomorrow and get her an iPod Touch.  Lesson learned.  Just my opinion.If you're already into the Android thing then you will probably be good to go.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Immanuel Wilson
Reviews.Content: I'm thirteen years old, but I'm inclined to write this review, mainly for parents or others who have been thinking of the product. I've had many fun times with my Kurio 4S in the 3 weeks that I've used it, and, while it hasn't been perfect, it's a snappy device that can do most things without a sweat. I wish I could give above five stars, though. I'm currently updating my 4S so that - you guessed it -  Google Play will be available! My rating is probably a little higher than it should be due to the fact that I'm tech savvy, but even so, it's a great device.

Reviews.Title: Great Service!
Reviews.Author: Rudy B
Reviews.Content: Product was received on time and ready for Christmas!  While we did not open or use them, our grandchildren seem to be very pleased with their Christmas gift.  Was very happy with the ease of which I ordered and received.  No fuss, no muss.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE PRODUCT!!  Do not waste your money and time!
Reviews.Author: Dianne Jackson
Reviews.Content: I have loved my Android phone and my tablet, but this product is so awkward and problematic to use.  I bought this because my son wants a tablet that looks like a phone (he wants a phone, but that's not happening yet).  Even though it will not load my son's favorite games such as Minecraft and you can't get Google Play loaded, I decided to keep it anyways.  That was a mistake.I have gotten an error message for every single thing we have tried to do anything.  Kurio Store is awful.  I've had to go to tech support and read FAQ about 20 times in 24 hours.  If you read the FAQ, you can tell that everyone is experiencing so many problems with this system.I'm pretty sure my son will end up going back to his REAL tablet and abandoning this one.I am so disappointed because I thought this product would be as user friendly, powerful, and flexible as my Android phone.  I thought I was an Android for life person, but this will probably be the last Android product I buy.  Guess it's time to finally make the switch to IPhone and IPad.

Reviews.Title: Only reccomnd this product.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The kurio 4s is only good for kids if they are 6 years or younger. most of the games on the Kurio touch are way to young for my 8 year. Not to mention if you have money to blow on the games in the kurio app store, the games are not free. And downloading the Amazon app store is blocked from the stupid kurio rectriction software. I bought this so my son would stay off my cell phone. He likes to download airplane and cowboy games from the google app store. None of these are available in the kurio store. looks like im gonna have to spend the extra dollars and get him a cell phone :( waist of money for my 8 year old!!

Reviews.Title: my son wanted this so badly.
Reviews.Author: Dovenetta A. Sims "brown suga"
Reviews.Content: I can't wait for my son to open this gift he wants this so badly. It came quickly also. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Williamson
Reviews.Content: Had a litte trouble getting it due to ice storms, but it finally made it....grandson will love his Christmas present.

Reviews.Title: Some Amazon Store Apps will not run if disconnected from store.
Reviews.Author: Grandma62
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 5 year old Grandson for Christmas.  It's fairly easy to set up.  The biggest drawback for me is that after purchasing apps from the Amazon App Store and then uninstalling the store (because I don't want my CC info stored in the device and also because I don't want to have WiFi going to use it) there are a few PAID FOR apps that will NO LONGER RUN because the store has been uninstalled.  And also while getting my Grandson's profile set up I noticed that many of the apps I downloaded had NOT child friendly ads popping up so I do NOT want this device connected to WiFi unless it can be supervised.

Reviews.Title: Captivating
Reviews.Author: George Feiser
Reviews.Content: The color!  The responsiveness!  The options!  This is one fine child friendly tablet a must buy for those looking to enhance their child's computer abilities.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product / service
Reviews.Author: marlondixon
Reviews.Content: My daughter LOVES the Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0 - 7-Inch 4 GB and I love it too because it keeps her quiet,busy and off my phone and laptop LOL !

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Robert L Daddona
Reviews.Content: I have no idea? We purchased the Tablet as a Christmas gift for our Grandson. We are however, long time customers of Amazon and would not still be a customer if not completely satisfied with your great customer service!! Have a great Holiday.

Reviews.Title: kids kurio
Reviews.Author: ANN
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my great granson's birthday and he just started using it on his birthday but he was thrilled to get it. It came quickly and was well packaged.

Reviews.Title: It's a christmas gift.
Reviews.Author: happy shoppper
Reviews.Content: Haven't given it to my grandson yet.  By the way - I just wanted one, you send and billed me for two.  Martha Lydick

Reviews.Title: Kurio Kids Tablet
Reviews.Author: Janice Scott
Reviews.Content: Great but does not hold a charge long enough.Easy to travel with but difficulty downloading other games from inrternet

Reviews.Title: VERY SLOW, DIFFICULT to use!!
Reviews.Author: V. W. Echeverri "J&V;"
Reviews.Content: We got this as a Christmas present for my toddler. He loved it and I was impressed by the looks. We played a games together, the Angry Birds, World of Goo, Water game, a Few Numbers games that we BOTH played. Best of all, it comes with the rubber bumper cover and a few Free full version games. Wow, great deal right?! NO not really.First, I noticed it took 2-3 HRS to charge compared to an Apple item that takes 30 mins. NOT cool when you have a 3-year old to distract while you get chores done or if you want to sit a little longer at a cafe.Next, it was DIFFICULT to set up, and this is that I am computer-literate. The keyboard is a pain to type in, underlines everything and is overly-sensitive as it types one extra letter. Also, the space is considered a key. Make sure you don't have a space after the password, Or Uh oh!It took me about 5 hours to figure out the Amazon app downloader when i went into Android interface. I was able to get 3 apps out of 10 because the Amazon app itself took 30 mins to download, WITH the help of Chat support!After all this, i noticed the 10 apps I chose didn't all go through because the system kept kicking off the Wi-fi signal. I've never had a problem with the Wi-fi in my house with ANY device, but the tablet keeps kicking it out.I went in the next day to re-install the Free kids apps from Amazon and the downloader tool wasn't working anymore. I have them in my Amazon purchase history but the downloader has completely stopped and to re-install is AGAIN a pain in the butt.Third, the tablet turns off even before the 2 minute "no activity" rule. it just plain turns off.I am really about to return this as I might as well get a Kindle or an iPad mini. It's not worth it to spend 3 hrs figuring out an electronic when you could be playing games with your child :(

Reviews.Title: Great for my son....and for me!
Reviews.Author: P. Davis
Reviews.Content: I'm really not sure why folks are leaving so many negative reviews.... I purchased this tablet for my 2-1/2 year old son for Christmas because he really likes my Galaxy S3 and my laptop....but I wanted something a little more kid-friendly on which I can control the content.  Out of the box it worked fine as an android tablet.  I set up the parental section and profiles for mommy, daddy and for my son.  As stated, the Kurio store is limited but I had no problem installing the Mobile 1 store or the Amazon app store.  I've installed plenty of free apps (mostly puzzles and coloring and writing stuff - my boy is only 2-1/2) for my son and I've installed many apps for mom (on the Android side).  I got the 32 GB microSD card and ripped several of his favorite movies into MP4 format and they play just fine.  Speaker sound is limited but I have an inexpensive set of headphones when needed.  I've streamed TV episodes that I've missed.... I've connected to WI-FI both at home and at my work and I really don't think that this tablet deserves all the poor reviews.  Like one earlier reviewer said - read the directions.  This is not an iPad.  This tablet is designed for a child.  It works well for kids and mommy has her kindle app and her netflix and its all good...

Reviews.Title: No boring specs, just a review of how it works
Reviews.Author: Cristi Snapp
Reviews.Content: Santa brought two of these to our house, one for each child. The 1st star is simply because I can not give a no star review, but the second one is because the kids love these... so far. I, however, do not. I tried accessing the Kurio store to look for new games and books and got a big fat nada. I went to the website (where I purchased these, I did not get them on Amazon) and found a list of instructions for installing updates for the new and improved Kurio store. Nada. The updates run halfway through and then then quit. The tablet has actually not "crashed" but the updates do not install properly, regardless of what I do. I am trying to install other app stores and I get, again, nada. I have tried contacting Kurio, but so far I have been very disappointed. I am afraid that I will be stuck with 2 $150 paper weights after the kids beat all the pre-installed games. If I had it do over again, I would have went with the Kindle Fire. So, if you want expensive paper weights, go ahead and purchase this item, but if you have other goals in mind, do a little more shopping around.

Reviews.Title: In the process of returning to store!
Reviews.Author: rustedharmony
Reviews.Content: Okay I bought this 2 days ago just before the store ran out. I was excited because my daughter wants to play with our Amazon tablets and laptop. So I had a chance to set it up only to have the Amazon App store wont log me in anymore (reading error try again later) when my other tablet let me in! It also began to read errors on downloaded apps I had in the Cloud. I couldnt get into the games for 5 seconds before it said "error" and shutting it down. Yesterday it erased 5 apps out of no where so I tried to redownload them, only to find I couldnt get into my app store. Also if you want to get into the internet, you need to bookmark the pages unless you want your 4 year old to memorize (www) whole site links to access the site. And in order to get into the bookmark options your child will have to search so this is not exactly "Free Reign" by themselves playing with Parental Control. It will be you being handed the devices every 10 minute to figure out where to go! The games that are on there didnt really fit a 3-5 year old unless they know high math facts. I am just going to let my daughter play on my tablet with her own slide page of games. I wish it worked because my daughter would have loved this Parental Control device! Near the end only half of the apps work from me downloading off the Amazon Cloud from the day before. ONE BIG POINT if you stored apps on the micro sd, it will not read them! I had to search to find the 4 movies I had on my 16GB (in the file manager). So overall, dont get it. If you want to be frustrated, go ahead. I am getting my $149 plus tax back!

Reviews.Title: Dissappointed /Liked it
Reviews.Author: HstnWins2012
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Tablet for my two children for Xmas 2012. My got a chance to pick a gift to open and she picked the Tablet. For what it is worth, its a kid friendly tablet. After a couple hours playing with it and plugging it up to charge. My daughter ran downstairs and said it was really HOT! I took the tablet and had to get a towel to take off the drop holder. The tablet was extremly HOT. I contacted online chat and they will be sending me a replacement.Online tech support told me it was the first they had heard about the Tablet overheating. Anyone else have this issue?

Reviews.Title: This tablet is awful!!
Reviews.Author: Kristen Massey "Speed Reader"
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kurio for my son's birthday as it seemed to have more apps than the Meep or Tabeo at Toys R Us. The good thing is it charged pretty quick so my son could play with it, the bad thing is this tablet is not really kid friendly or even adult friendly. I spent hours in frustration trying to set the internet to websites I approved and when I finally figured that out, it would not let me go to Disneyjr.com and kept kicking me back to Disney for grown ups. When I decided to allow full internet access to see if it would let me go to my son's favorite website, the Google SafeSearch browser was immediately hijacked with inappropriate ads popping up all over, and even with full internet access it would not take me to Disneyjr.Also, the pressure needed to work the tablet is too much and light touches on the screen do not work. I found myself having to press quite hard on the screen.I was going to exchange it for a Meep today, but I read the reviews on Amazon and now I am not so sure I will do that since not many people loved that either.

Reviews.Title: Katie's kurio
Reviews.Author: Katherine Jordan "kitty"
Reviews.Content: Grand daughter loves it.she knows more about it than I do .She is very smart .loves the games on it.

Reviews.Title: Worst purchase
Reviews.Author: Alanna
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter because it had "parental controls" I would set up her profile and do my parental controls and I would download apps for her. Half of the apps wouldn't work at all, and the other half wouldn't work because the kurio genius system would block it. It pretty much over rode everything that I put in the settings. It even did this in parental profile. I sent it back a week later and purchased her a Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: BE CAREFUL WHAT YOUR KIDS LOOK AT
Reviews.Author: jeremy kidd
Reviews.Content: We set up the Kurio to be safe for our daughter. It is NOT! My 8 year old has now watched nothing but porn! I am appalled. She is too young for that and this was supposed to be safe and have a filtering system!!!!!!!!!! We set it up correctly and she did not have the parental password! This did not work as they said it would. BE CAREFUL!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Dud
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: I would have done better by just getting a tablet, but my child wanted a handheld...the password retrieval fiasco is an experience I would wish on no parent. Good luck if you get it. You might need a degree in IT

Reviews.Title: Hate it!!!!!!! Do not buy!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: stacey gautney
Reviews.Content: We got one for my son for Christmas work fine and then started to download apps by it self( not kids apps) and I could not uninstall then off of it so I done a reset on it and it deleted all the app that came with it!!!!! So I went online and try to do to recover Kurio 7s like it said note I tried this for 3 days and it still didn't work got on line for them to help sent emails after emails and they sent the some thing over and over and I tried to tell them I didn't work. Ask them if I could send it to them or get a number but the never sent anything back!!!!!!!! So here I am with this stupid Kurio 7 s tablet that we paied 170 for and it don't work and I have a vere upset son!!!!!!!!!! Please do not buy this it is not worth the money or your time

Reviews.Title: amazing experience
Reviews.Author: Rachel Mercier
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my experience with amazon; everything came on time as promised. eventhough I had a little difficulty with one of my merchandise, you took care of the problem as soon as I complained about it.thank you for that.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Article
Reviews.Author: Leonel Peña
Reviews.Content: Give the gift item to my oldest daughter, in their Christmas, good presentation and has a protective rubber bumps, there is only a small objection computer volume is a little low.

Reviews.Title: It's ok
Reviews.Author: Deborah Mills
Reviews.Content: It is ok for young children. I really dislike if I rate something that I have to use a set number of words.  i would be more likely to rate on amazon if I didn't have to write a paragraph.

Reviews.Title: Slow and clunky... not for tech savvy kids...
Reviews.Author: Barchetta
Reviews.Content: I have to agree with "gatermomz"....  I'm a network admin and in the same situation.  Looking for a tab that manages content access to the internet.  While the setup for parental control was easy, the actual use of the device was "vacuumous".  Perhaps this would be good for a toddler, but my tech-savvy 8 year old was frustrated and wanted to return it within an hour of receiving it.  Ran into the same problems.  Google Play would not load, games would say that they were installed when they were not....  I am in the process of putting it back in the box and heading back to face the returns line.

Reviews.Title: Piece of crap for kids
Reviews.Author: Teena Crawford
Reviews.Content: Hey this program is slow. They talk about kid friendly. the whole navigation system is crap. Hey if you got a special child Ipad is the best. my daughter who is two can read do to the IPad. YOU CAN SET SAFTY CONTROL ON IPAD. Don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: niño feliz
Reviews.Author: esteban dario trivino rivera
Reviews.Content: todos felices mas nada que decir mas nada que decir mas nada que decir mas nada que decir mas nada que de

Reviews.Title: I returned it -- I dont recommend
Reviews.Author: James Kelly
Reviews.Content: I found the specs to be subpar compared to other tablets out there -- in particular -- the Google Nexus 7 is a much better buy right now.  The touchscreen did not feel very responsive compared to my 10ince Asus Prime TF201 tablet and the Ipad 2.  Plus, you do not have full access to the Android market which would enable you to download apps you purchased on other tablets and phones for free.  The resolution of the screen is very poor also for browsing.

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Kayla
Reviews.Content: This thing is horrible. Yeah it comes with preloaded games, nice. What isn't nice is the fact that YOU CAN'T GET ANY OTHER GAMES!! The kurio store won't work, the amazon App Store won't work, nothing works. The camera is not a very good quality at all. Definitely being returned. GET A KINDLE AND A CASE!!!  Save yourself the time!

Reviews.Title: Will not connect to the internet.
Reviews.Author: Megan B
Reviews.Content: We got the Kurio 7s for our kids, ages 7 and 5, for Christmas.  We opened them and tried to set them up Christmas Eve and they both showed a message about not connecting to the internet.  We could see from the display screen they were on our WiFi but they would not connect in order to download other games and apps.  We went ahead and gave them to the kids on Christmas day hoping it was a fluke but when they opened them, they still would not connect.  What good is a tablet if you can't connect to the internet and download more games and apps?  On Christmas day there was understandably no Kurio support available but the day after we tried chatting with Kurio technical support - there is no phone tech support and the internet tech support worked about as well as the internet on the actual Kurio, which is to say, hardly at all.  In an hour, we were able to send approximately 5 messages back and forth (each message took longer than 5 minutes to transmit) which provided no insight. We ended up taking the Kurios back to the store and purchased Nabis for our children instead.  So far, it has been a MUCH better experience.  Please, don't waste your time with a Kurio if your kids are at all interested in using it with games that aren't installed already.  What a let down.

Reviews.Title: sucksI give it a 2 star due to the quality
Reviews.Author: kiki
Reviews.Content: dont like not very good I give it a 2 star due to the quality and of how reliable this product is.

Reviews.Title: not as advertised
Reviews.Author: Kristin
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughters seventh birthday. It's difficult to navigate and operate. Does not come with 50 apps like it says it does. The books app it comes with has maybe two free childrens books and I couldn't even get them to download. The touch screen is extremely annoying. It either doesn't work or it is too sensitive. When trying to scroll it constantly clicks on things do you have to wait then press back. When trying to select something you sit and wait then have to click again. It comes with a video player but it's up to you to figure out how to get movies on your device. I have Amazon prime so after bringing up a movie through the browser (not easy) I pressed play and to my surprise the volume was up ALL THE WAY both on the device and my browser and I could barely make out what was being said. So my child basically got an expensive device to play a few games she could have played on my damn phone. Needless to say I am returning this item today and getting her the Amazon kindle fire. I'm hoping we will be much happier with that!

Reviews.Title: POOR
Reviews.Author: PAMELA CARAGIANIS
Reviews.Content: FOR THE FIFTH AND FINAL TIME I ORDERED 2 OF THESE AND AS OF TODAY NEVER RECEIVED THEM !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  MY ACCOUNT HAS BEEN CHARGED BUT I DO NOT HAVE THE PRODUCT !!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kurio tablet
Reviews.Author: nadia
Reviews.Content: This product is more or less for my gir no I liked it , she liked you tube and this is blocked because I need returned.

Reviews.Title: Horrible  Product
Reviews.Author: zippy
Reviews.Content: My Mom bought the Kurio 7 for my nieces and nephews for Christmas and asked me to try it out before she bought the others.  I was very excited about this product after reading about it .  Well I got it home followed the setup instructions and it froze. I turned it off and when I turned it back on it wouldn't load to the main screen, just the screen were it says Kurio 7.  So I exchanged it, figuring it was just a glitch. Well it wasn't I got the new one, charged it and followed the setup instructions and once again after a couple of minutes it froze and I couldn't get back to the home screen.  I wouldn't recommend

Reviews.Title: Nightmare to get apps...
Reviews.Author: Sweattle
Reviews.Content: The idea behind this product is awesome and I bought one as soon as they were out. I have spent hours trying to do what I can do with my smartphone in 2 minutes. The filters just reem you with an "Oops, Kurio has blocked this". Buy a normal tablet and just watch your kids like hawks.

Reviews.Title: Frustratingly poor
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: Bought this on the basis that it ran the latest Android 4.x, had a bumper and had in built kidsafe and parental controls. That said that's about all its got. I bought in the uk for use in uk. Whilst i can forgive some of its shortcomings (slow processor, low screen resolution, dire battery life, American everything (not good if your child is learning UK English)what i cant forgive is its total failure to get itself Google Play compliant. The alternative offering (Kurio Store) is ridiculously inadequate. While all my 6 year old's friends play Google sourced games on their IPads or Android tablets, mine can't get access to them through any app store.What's more, the few popular games/videos she can access are virtually useless as the Kurio can't play many popular video formats.Given that a 7" low res, slow processor tablet can be sourced for £60 - £80 this is very poor value.

ProductInfo.Features:
control when and how long kids can use it
define which type of websites can be accessed
define which type of apps can be accessed
set up to 8 profiles
tons of preloaded content
ProductInfo.Name: Kurio Kids Tablet with Android 4.0 - 7-Inch 4 GB
